DOC.detailed_description: Background : Congestive heart failure ( CHF ) one common reason hospitalization patient age 65 year old . Home-based intervention program reduce unplanned readmission rate patient CHF 50 percent . Using advanced telecommunication technology possible provide greatly improved access availability service timely cost effective manner directly patients� home . Although telehealth offer number theoretical advantage , empirical study compare telehealth traditional delivery mode , virtually study compare effectiveness alternative telehealth application . Objectives : The purpose study compare effectiveness resource use two telehealth intervention traditional care provide recently discharge outpatient CHF . Four hypothesis test . Compared subject receive usual care , subject receive telehealth intervention ( telephone interactive video ) follow discharge : 1 ) low readmission rate ; 2 ) report improve quality life , self-efficacy , satisfaction care ; 3 ) use few resource , include hospital day , urgent care visit , telephone call ; 4 ) high survival rate . Methods : The study randomize controlled clinical trial . We compare usual care intervention deliver either telephone interactive video veteran follow discharge hospital . A total 198 subject enrol three year . Subjects treatment group ( telephone interactive video ) receive intervention 90 day follow discharge hospital . Data collect include measure quality life , self-efficacy , satisfaction , resource use , mortality . Status : Project work ongoing .
